channel.title: How do i change drops of npc's

item.title: How do i change drops of npc's
item.dc:creator: @br4it0ns br4it0ns
item.description:
@br4it0ns wrote:

go to item2.java and add this [code]public static int NAME[] = {1202,1373,1371,1371,1369,1369,1369,1367,1367,1367,1367,1365,1365,1365,1365,1365,1363,1363,1363,1363,1363,1363,1363,1359,1359,1323,1323,1323,1323,1323,1323,1323,1323};

public static int goblin2()
{
	return NAME[(int)(Math.random()*NAME.length)];
}[/code]

yuo can change the numbers for the id of the item to drop

then go to npchandler.java and search for randomkbd and below the last randomkbd tht shud be

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

add this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ###) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.NAME(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

chnge the ### to he npc id, save and compile
